special_text:
[+1]: Create a Unfettered Eidolon token. [i](It’s a {2}{R} 3/3 Spirit Soldier enchantment creature with “This creature can’t block unless you control another enchantment.”[/i]
[-2]: Koios deals damage to any target equal to your devotion to red. [i](Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)[/i]
[-10]: Exile all but the bottom card of your library. You may cast any number of red cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
